name: surakshi-bharat
description: Disaster Preparedness Learning Platform with OAuth Authentication

scripts.setup: node -e "console.log('Run setup.bat on Windows or setup.sh on Mac/Linux')"
scripts.check-env: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); if(!fs.existsSync('.env')){console.log('❌ .env file missing! Run: npm run setup'); process.exit(1);} else {console.log('✅ .env file found');}"
scripts.start: npm run check-env && npm run dev
